original_title: The Prince of Plasma: The Giannetto De Rossi Story
overview: Produced for the German Blu-Ray of "Daylight" from Turbine Films. Also featured on the American Blu-Ray of "Killer Crocodile"/ "Killer Crocodile 2" from Severin Films.
title: The Prince of Plasma: The Giannetto De Rossi Story
